main module¶

main.py

This module contains the class definitions for the School Management System.

Classes: - Person - Student - Instructor - Course

class main.Course(course_id, course_name, instructor, enrolled_students=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Course class represents a course in the system.

Parameters:

  • course_id (str) – The unique ID of the course.

  • course_name (str) – The name of the course.

  • instructor (Instructor) – The instructor teaching the course.

  • enrolled_students (list) – List of students enrolled in the course.

Raises:

AssertionError – If input types are incorrect.

add_student(student)[source]¶

Adds a student to the course.

Parameters:

student (Student) – The student to add.

Raises:

AssertionError – If the student is not a Student object.

classmethod from_dict(data, instructors, students)[source]¶

Creates a Course object from a dictionary.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – The data dictionary.

  • instructors (list) – List of available instructors.

  • students (list) – List of available students.

Returns:

A Course object.

Return type:

Course

Converts the object to a dictionary.

Returns:

Dictionary representation of the course.

class main.Instructor(name, age, email, instructor_id, assigned_courses=None)[source]¶

Bases: Person

The Instructor class represents an instructor, inheriting from Person.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the instructor.

  • age (int) – The age of the instructor.

  • email (str) – The email address of the instructor.

  • instructor_id (str) – The unique ID of the instructor.

  • assigned_courses (list) – List of courses assigned to the instructor.

Raises:

AssertionError – If input types are incorrect.

assign_course(course)[source]¶

Assigns a course to the instructor.

Parameters:

course (Course) – The course to assign.

Raises:

AssertionError – If the course is not a Course object.

class main.Person(name, age, email)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Person class represents a generic person with basic attributes.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the person.

  • age (int) – The age of the person.

  • email (str) – The email address of the person.

Raises:

  • AssertionError – If input types are incorrect.

  • ValueError – If email format is invalid.

class main.Student(name, age, email, student_id, registered_courses=None)[source]¶

Bases: Person

The Student class represents a student, inheriting from Person.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the student.

  • age (int) – The age of the student.

  • email (str) – The email address of the student.

  • student_id (str) – The unique ID of the student.

  • registered_courses (list) – List of courses the student is registered in.

Raises:

AssertionError – If input types are incorrect.
